review.title: Bay Trail view
review.reviewText: This hotel was a wonderful choice for me - it was right off of the 101, and the Bay Trail connection was directly behind the hotel.  The room was quiet, clean, and comfortable.  The buffet breakfast was yummy and had options for everyone; the pancake maker was my favorite.  The smell of fresh-baked cookies greeted guests every evening.

*Gas station for fill-ups is less than a quarter mile away
*Entrance to 101 is in front of the hotel

Great stay altogether.

review.title: Nice hotel close to airport
review.reviewText:
Overall a good experience minus checking-in.  We arrived at 1:30am and were very tired and had a flight out at noon.  We want to get into our room quickly.  The person checking us in seemed very confused.  We had our paid reservation yet she was telling us the room was not available.  Then she tried to push other rooms on us which would not sleep our family of 4 (two teenage boys).  Finally, after 15 minutes of going back in forth she gave us exactly the room we paid for.  She still made it seem like she wasn't giving us what she was suppose to.  I really don't get it.

Anyway, we got to the room, the temperature was adjustable (so we could put it down low), the beds were comfortable, the sheets clean and fresh.  We sleep well and then enjoyed the breakfast when we got up.  So in the end, it was a good experience, just wished the person checking us in knew what they were doing.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to airport.  Had breakfast.  Had room with 2 queen beds.
review.negativeRemarks: Checking-in experience.  Don't tell people you don't have their room when you do and don't just say you are sorry.  Fix the problem.

review.title: Disappointing Experience - Poor Service
review.reviewText: Arrived on September 14 after a long flight from Asia. After checking into room 361, i quickly noticed that the room is extremely warm even though the AC is on. Then i noticed that the wifi signal is extremely weak and sometimes the hotel wifi network did not even appear on my iphone's wifi available network. I quickly phoned the reception and told them about the wifi and they said the signal should be the same throughout the property (which is a lie obviously) and i should switched my phone off and turned it back on (this is the first i heard anyway that restarting the phone will improve the wifi signal). After trying what i have been told, there was no improvement and the room is still warm even though the AC has been on for more than 30 minutes by now. I called to the reception again and the lady said there is no more room available. I booked the room 2 months in advance and after a long flight, the last thing i want to deal with is endless problems and yet i have been allocated such a lousy room. I was not pleased at all with and decided to forget about the wifi and to use the data roaming. The free wifi network is apparently a joke as it is only working if you are close to where the wireless routers are (not if your room is far away from the routers). I will not return to this hotel again as the staffs made no effort to keep the customers happy and i will not recommend anyone to stay here.

review.title: Tired traveler pleasantly surprised
review.reviewText: I had a nice experience. No complaints worth mentioning. The hotel overall actually exceeded my expectations. I travel a lot to Europe, and when I return to California, I always suffer from jet lag and extreme exhaustion. So, upon arriving from a 2-month stay overseas, I decided to stay a couple nights at a decent budget hotel near the airport before retuning home and to work. I just needed a comfy place to relax without paying too much. I didn't expect anything special since all I intended to do was eat and sleep, but I have to admit that I was very satisfied during my stay. The staff is very nice and the King room was comfy and clean. Sure, you might notice some wear and tear here and there, but it wasn't bad enough to affect my stay. I had the pool view which was not a pretty sight at all, but I had planned to keep the shutters closed anyway, so this was not an issue. If you're looking for a place to rest on a budget that includes free amenities near the airport, I would recommend this hotel. Also, the free continental breakfast was actually really nice! I was expecting so much worse. I didn't, however, try Max's, the restaurant on the property, but it seemed like it offered decent food. Overall, I was very happy with my choice.
review.positiveRemarks: The room.
review.negativeRemarks: The pool view.

Only small issue with the room is the use of shutters and not blackout curtains so there is a little light leakage. Complimentary breakfast was passable. Used the shuttle bus another 3 times and it worked well.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenient with a shuttle running until 1AM allowing San Francisco to be visited. On site restaurant is good.
review.negativeRemarks: The trouble with the shuttle on arrival after a transatlantic flight
review.locationRemarks: 10 minutes from the airport and BART with an on site restaurant. Not much in the immediate area

review.title: Great location, clean, large, amazing restaurant!
review.reviewText:
Stayed in this Hotel on two separate occasions in a week. It was really good. The rooms are massive, a huge T.V., the staff were helpful, quick check-in and check-out. There is a small swimming pool which was nice. The breakfast was pretty good - they have a pan-cake making machine, two pan cakes in a minute!!!!

Another great aspect of this hotel is it is so close to the airport, just off of route 101. You can get the shuttle bus or if you're driving it takes a few minutes. Also, its close to the first BART train station which you can park at for $2 a day so can get into San Francisco relatively easy.

The best bit was that its next to the most amazing restaurant that I would highly recommend. I had the pastrami sandwich which was to die for!

Highly recommend!!!
review.positiveRemarks: Location near airport, easy to get to
review.negativeRemarks: a little dated but that doesn't bother me too much
review.locationRemarks: great location

review.title: Great for business trips
review.reviewText: This hotal is a great option for sleeping close to the airport, or if you want to stay out of the city. It has everything needed for a quiet night after a long day of work.

review.title: Good stay
review.reviewText: Great hotel. Not the best location and the immediate surrounding area is pretty beaten down/trashy. But overall, great hotel. No Hot tub:(

review.title: Not for a family
review.reviewText: It's overpriced for a room and everything. Specially, we waited the shuttle over half hour.

review.title: Holiday Inn Express on Bayshore....consider it.
review.reviewText:
This looks like an older hotel that has been remodeled. Room itself was fine. Breakfast was fine. Best feature was the location to the airport and bay. If you didn't have to stay by the airport, you would want to stay in a different area of SF, as there is relatively little to do by the airport.
The pool is an outside pool. It does have a nice resaurant/bar just in front of the motel, so that is a plus.
It has a very nice atrium, but it is limited to the entrance. The rate was very high for a Holiday Inn Express, but likely not for the location.....yards from the bay.
The room itself was nice, clean, comfortable, and had a good view of the bay.
If rate is better than you can get at Crowne Plaza or the Hyatt, go for it. If not, look elsewhere , such as either of those options.
If you are there as a tourist, don't stay in this area....go to Fisherman's Warf or the Financial district.
review.positiveRemarks: Location by the bay.
review.negativeRemarks: Very ordinary motel, considering the price
review.locationRemarks: Location is very good, if you need to stay by the airport. Otherwise, go elsewhere.

review.title: Disappointing
review.reviewText: The bathroom need cleaning. The tub had not been properly cleaned in some time. I notified the Front Desk, who seemed less than concerned.

review.title: nice place
review.reviewText: Very clean hotel. It was quiet, and the room were big. I would stay here again!
review.positiveRemarks: clean, and roomy. nice breakfast assortment too.
review.negativeRemarks: the air conditioner was a bit noisy. the bathroom door should open out, with it opening in to the bathroom, it made it awkward to get out.
review.locationRemarks: SanFrancisco area, (Burlingame) California. we had a wedding to go to!

review.title: Good hotel
review.reviewText:
The hotel was clean and tidy. It is close to the airport and they have 24 hour shuttle service. We were flying from San Francisco to Philadelphia. We dropped off the rental car and caught a shuttle back to the hotel, and then left for the airport the next morning on the shuttle.

They have a really nice breakfast with eggs, bacon, coffee, tea, and baked goods
review.positiveRemarks: Nearness to the airport and 24 hour shuttle service
review.negativeRemarks: none
review.locationRemarks: Convenient to the airport and Max's restaurant - a good meal!

review.title: Comfortable hotel
review.reviewText: Staff was friendly , and quick to respond to my requests. Room was promptly cleaned every afternoon , and toiletries re stocked daily . Bathrooms were clean , my only complaint would be the mold. In shower. There is no ventilation in bathrooms .

review.title: good for travel
review.reviewText: I booked a room that was supposed to overlook the pool, but didn't get one. The girl that was working during my checkout was not good at her job and rude. But the room was pretty clean and comfortable, and the complimentary breakfast was nice.

review.title: Ideal location - Excellent value for money!
review.reviewText: Great location, just outside San Francisco and close to the main international airport. Plenty of car park facility and staff were very helpful!

review.title: Overall a good buy for the money.
review.reviewText: I had business in San Mateo and this hotel was situated nicely in between there and the airport. Free airport shuttle was a nice bonus. Bar/restaurant right next door wasn't bad but closed too early. The doors seemed a bit thin. I was fine in my room but could hear everything going on behind people's doors as I walked down the hall. Kind of weird. It's right on the water but you can't see anything because they have a row of trees inexplicably blocking the view for the entire length of the property. Pretty good restaurants nearby.
review.positiveRemarks: Free airport shuttle.
review.negativeRemarks: Bathrooms are tiny. Doors are thin.
review.locationRemarks: Location is good if you're looking to do stuff south of the airport. The actual city was much further away than it looked on a map.

review.title: Disappointing
review.reviewText: This hotel was not up to Holiday Inn's usual standards. The rooms were clean, the front desk staff were fairly helpful and the airport/Bart shuttle was convenient. However, the breakfast was dreadful. The orange juice was so watered down it looked like pale pineapple juice, the eggs were swimming in liquid, the bacon was limp and greasy and the biscuits could break your teeth. The biggest problem is this hotel caters to the type of foreign visitors who travel in large groups, don't speak English and are very pushy and rude. They took over the lobby, breakfast room and the shuttle.

review.title: Solid SFO Hotel
review.reviewText: this is a solid hotel for short stays and a need to be close to SFO. The rooms are comfortable and the location is great for business travelers. The hotel can be noisy.
review.positiveRemarks: location
review.negativeRemarks: noise and room features
review.locationRemarks: really close to SFO

review.title: Good deal and great place to stay!
review.reviewText: Great hotel, good price and super friendly staff. The breakfast in the morning was great as well!!
review.positiveRemarks: The cookies!

review.title: Airport hotel for Airport travelers
review.reviewText: Serves the purpose of lodging near the airport. that is the only reason you would stay here.

review.title: never again
review.reviewText: due to fog at SFO, our inbound flight was delayed. I called the property and advised that that I would be checking in late. We arrived at 21:45 to be advised that my bay view room had been given away, the room service had ended at 21:00 and the adjacent hotel closed at 22:00. So I dropped my bags and ran to get something to eat. Coming back I discovered that the room I got, well the bathtub had hair in it, the shutters didn't close so it let the street lights in and the A/C didn't want to cool the room below 80. The girl at the front desk was unhelpful. I will assuming her rudeness was due to the fact that the line of people waiting on service and the constant ringing of the phones had her overwhelmed. There is a large selection of lodging in the area, so never returning to this property is not a problem

review.title: SFO
review.reviewText: Nice visuals with grand staircase. Good breakfast and shuttle service.
review.positiveRemarks: Staircase/breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: Lack of vending machines on each floor
review.locationRemarks: Great for SFO travel

review.title: Our S.F. trip Feb. 2012
review.reviewText: I felt that the rooms were a good size. The only complaint is that the bathrooms are small but it would have been better if they had the bathroom door pull out instead of it go into the bathroom. It made it hard to have two people in there getting ready if necessary.
review.positiveRemarks: Easy access from the freeway and continential breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: The small bathrooms and door to go into the bathroom
review.locationRemarks: It sits along the San Francisco bay, quiet area, you can watch planes land and take off.

review.title: maid was rude
review.reviewText: maid open the door right after 2knocks and asked when we're going to leave for 2consecutive days at 8;50 AM. I felt like I was kicked out of this hotel.

review.title: In the middle of Nowhere
review.reviewText: Hotel really is in the middle of nowhere, very limited facilities in the area to eat if like me you arrive after 10pm, the hotel is clean, comfortable, functional but there is really only 1 place to eat after 22:00 thats Knuckles Bar within the Hyatt Hotel across the road, also paid for a pool view room, , was given a room overlooking the car park,

review.title: Great Hotel for the money!
review.reviewText: We were well pleased with this hotel overall. Clean, nice staff, good breakfast. Great location if you don't want to be in the city. Easy freeway access. 15 min to downtown.

review.title: Very good hotel but full bed little small for 2
review.reviewText: see the title

review.title: Not impressed
review.reviewText: My husband and I stayed at this hotel because of it's location and good reputation of Holiday Inn Express Hotels. Well let me tell you something, the room's AC didn't work, so they had to move us to another room. The second room was not that clean, even though the housekeeper "cleaned" the room almost daily, it didn't look clean. One day we asked her to change the linnens for clean ones and when we came back, discovered there was a nasty blood stain on the sheet that covered the beed. It was big enogh for her to see it, still decided to leave it like that. Breakfast was so so, very inconsistent. The front desk personnel was not that friendly, just very dry and inexperienced.

review.title: Fine for an overnight
review.reviewText: The room was small but fairly clean. Hotel staff are friendly, buffet is decent quality and variety. Noise levels from the airport were decent. If you get a good rate, this is a good deal.

review.title: Great Park/Fly/Stay package.
review.reviewText: Great accommodations and the breakfast was delicious with abundant choices. Would use this park/fly/stay again. again.

review.title: GOOD OPTION
review.reviewText: It is one of best place for transit or for the business between SF and Silicon Valey area. Reasonable price. Clean room and nice bright lobby.

review.title: Smaller Holiday Inn Express
review.reviewText:
This Holiday Inn Express is very close to the airport although you would need a car to take advantage of the great eating places in the surrounding neighborhoods. It's easy to get in and out of the freeway.The front desk, cleaning and breakfast services were very good.
However, if you are traveling with family, in my case 4 of us, the room is smaller than the other holiday inn express hotels we've stayed at. The beds are very uncomfortable and the bathroom is very small.

review.title: What I Expected
review.reviewText: I have never had a bad experience with any Holiday Inn Express

review.title: Good bargain hotel with free full breakfast
review.reviewText: This is probably the best deal you can get around SFO that has free shuttle to take you to the airport or to the BART station to get around.

review.title: Staff service lacking!
review.reviewText: Our hotel stay would have been rated as a 4 out of 5 were it not for the service. The maid service cleaned our room but did not restock used items in the room. We used the coffee and water on the first day. When we returned for the evening and noticed the omission, we called the front desk. We like coffee while getting dressed. I explained this to the desk clerk and she was less than understanding. Finally she said the coffee would be sent up in 5 - 10 minutes. The coffee never showed up! We called the next morning to have it brought up and they said they would do that but that delivery took 2 hours. When we told the front desk upon checking out. They said they were sorry but offered nothing to compensate us for the poor service.

review.title: Not impressed, but satisfied
review.reviewText: This hotel is located near the Airport, so we were convenient to check out and check in the flight. The service was very good, and the breakfast was simple and delicious. However, the mattress and the sheet were not clean and stained. If you going to San Frnacisco, be sure to wear a thick jacket.

review.title: enjoyed my stay
review.reviewText: location is excellent, surrounding area has limited food and shopping within walking distance. Price and service at hotel was very good. Breakfast was acceptable. Room was comfortable and quiet, especially for being so close to the interstate.

review.title: Great price and great location.
review.reviewText: Will stay here again. Great view of the water front.

review.title: Great Vacation
review.reviewText: The Holiday Inn Express offers great service, convenient location, and amazing hot breakfast. You will be surprised. With the parking and wi-fi also included, the bay-view waterfront location and bike path offer a great way to enjoy the area immediately after checking in.

review.title: close to the airport
review.reviewText: small,clean rooms,good breakfast

review.title: Best Location...Friendly Staff!
review.reviewText: Nice hotel, clean, quiet, nice view of the bay and great location. Very close to the airport and the freeway. The staff are friendly and helpful. I like the complimentary breakfast and the 24 hours tea and coffee station in the hotel lobby. We enjoyed our stay in the hotel. I was just disappointed that I wasn't able to swim in the outdoor pool that looked inviting because it was not warm enough the 4 days that we were there in August. Overall, the hotel is great for the price. This hotel was way better than other hotels in the same class.

review.title: Great Value, great service, and great food!
review.reviewText: Breakfast was good, plenty of selection. Only 2 computers for internet did not seem sufficient enough though, especially nowadays when just about everyone is using the internet. The room was cleaned everyday, however the bathroom is very tiny. I was very pleased with my stay at the Holiday Inn Express.

review.title: Good value for the money
review.reviewText:
This hotel was just as good as it looked on the web. Staff were overall very helpful, breakfast was quite varied and kept well stocked over the breakfast period.
We particularly enjoyed the view and the walking path around the bay.
Parking and pool were also good. Overall a good place to stay.

review.title: A "Gem" at the Bay!
review.reviewText: Upon a late arrival we were welcomed to a gracious hotel with a pleasant host. Accommodations were great and room was close by on first floor as requested. A superb hot continental breakfast was explained. The hotel was very close to the airport with easy access to returning our rental car. Comfortable beds led to a good sleep after a late night at the Giants ballpark which had easy and close access to the Caltrains to and from the ballpark. A reasonable price stay away from the high cost of downtown hotels and free parking!

review.title: Great place to stay
review.reviewText: The only issue I had with this hotel was their maid service, every morning just before 8:00am they were knocking on our door and letting themselves in while we were still in bed!! I'd tell them we're still here and they would come back and do it again 15 minutes later.

review.title: Will definitely stay there again
review.reviewText: Great location for me as I had friends who lived in Burlingame who could pick me up. No complaints on the rooms. Very clean and comfortable beds always a plus. Exceeded my expectations. Nice spread at the complimentary breakfast but only for early risers because it stops at 9/9:30. Only gave hotel service a 4 because I had to hunt down someone from the front desk to extend my checkout. Other than that, everything was great. PS. If you dont have a ride to town, their only shuttle to downtown SF leaves at the crack of dawn, so if you plan on sleeping in, better take a taxi or the BART! ....but I would STILL recommend this place to all my friends!

review.title: Perfect for night before flight
review.reviewText:
The check in staff was great, convenient shuttle service to airport allowed us to check in our rental car a day early and the attached restaurant was very good for dinner and the evening's entertainment. Great view of the city skyline, too.

Breakfast was perfectly adequate and convenient.

AM shuttle to the airport was right on time. We'd go back again.

review.title: Nice and clean hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel was clean and the employees are very nice to you, rates are very accesible. Hotel is very close to the airport and the bart sation. Rooms were small and clean. Nice hotel to stay for three days.

review.title: "It was a great vacation"
review.reviewText: Well San Francisco was a very pleasant stay. My family had a great time and so did I. The hotel was fine the staff was very nice and friendly they make you feel at home. I would recomended to my friends and family.

review.title: Weaver1
review.reviewText: Stayed here in Feb. Was back in March cause I liked it to well. Love walking next to the bay in the early morning. And love that Max's is next door with great food. Nice quiet location with super easy access to freeway.

review.title: Will use again.
review.reviewText: It was an enjoyable stay. Breakfast was good and it was within walking distance to our conference.

review.title: Convienient and freindly location fir SFO airport
review.reviewText:
Good room with nice view of the bay ( stay on 3rd floor to see the water and planes take off

Hotel has great food in the restaurant in front with good prices.

The hotel gym is nest to the guest laundry which was convienient

review.title: Destructive to the Environment!
review.reviewText:
While this hotel is clean, I am appalled at their lack of environmental concern. The rooms all have signs which state "Help us save the environment by reusing your bath towels" yet for their buffet breakfast, all food was served on STYROFOAM!!!! I asked the front desk about this and she just shrugged.

We spent our vacation in Yosemite National Park which really makes us appreciate Mother Earth. Holiday Inn could afford to use real plates but it is surely too expensive to hire someone to wash and dry. Instead, profits clearly outweigh the environmental impact their actions cause.

We will not be staying at a Holiday Inn again.

review.title: Not too much Impressed
review.reviewText: The Inn was just okay. The closet was too small and can't hang our clothes for the entire three days we were there. A hole on the ceiling was noticeable in the room and no light to switch on when you enter the room. The front desk associate was not too friendly, can't even break a smile! The cleaning crew opened the door without knocking at all while we were sleeping. On the contrary, the breakfast served every morning was good and enjoyed by the family.

review.title: smelly hallway and carpets
review.reviewText: we usually dont have complains about most hotels we stay if it has a decent bed and bathroom.this hotel should definetly improve on their bathrooms.the carpets need to be changed as the entire floor we stayed was stinking.this isnt the standard that you expect out of a holiday inn express.the breakfast had a decent spread but everything was bland.

review.title: Will definitely go back
review.reviewText: The hotel offered clean and comfortable rooms. Staff were friendly. One thing that the hotel can improve on is the swimming pool. Since it is located in an area known to be cooler than most cities, a water heated pool would be great.

review.title: Very Nice
review.reviewText: This hotel was nice and comfortable. The staff was very attentive and polite. The full breakfast was better than expected.

review.title: I will go back , very positive experience
review.reviewText: Very nice people, friendly and accommodating to our need.

review.title: good value
review.reviewText: Room is clean and big. We notice there is some kind of smell in the room (not bad smell, not like smoking smell). Great breakfast. Free parking and wifi.

review.title: good value
review.reviewText: i would say this was BEST value, but the parking issue really upset me. there are way more cars than there are parking spaces, i'm not sure why, but when you come back in the late afternoon/early evening from a meeting, the last thing you want is a 30 minute battle to find a parking spot.

review.title: Excelletn value for money
review.reviewText: Convenient to SFO. Excellent value for money. Terrific hot breakfast, free newspaper, fitness center. Airport shuttle runs every 20 minutes and can catch bus downtown from airport. Would definitely stay there agin.

review.title: only 15min from san francisco free breakfast and parking
review.reviewText: we are a family of five looking for the best deal for our money while visiting Sam Francisco.The room was very comfortable with a fridge and iron.The bathroom is a little small. The free breakfast and parking were great.After breakfast we got in our car and drove 15 min to san francisco and enjoyed the whole day.When we returned to our hotel at night the room was clean for us to rest and ready for another day at San Francisco.

review.title: Thought it was nice until...
review.reviewText: I thought this hotel was nice and a good buy until I spilled a little eyeshadow on my sheets and noticed they didn't change my sheets a day I was there for six nights! Other than that the service and breakfast the hotel provided were good.

review.title: Will definitely go back!
review.reviewText: Good hot breakfast (free), great access to hiking/jogging trail along the water. Staff friendly.

review.title: SFO Park and Fly
review.reviewText: Great deal if you're flying out of SFO.

review.title: Loved it!
review.reviewText: For the price this was a very nice hotel with good service. All of the staff members were very friendly and helpful. The very best thing about it was the location with the bay behind the hotel. We enjoyed walking along the path by the bay and the park nearby. It was also fun to watch the planes take off and land. We didn't notice any noise problems with being close to the airport. It would be nice if they could add a sitting area down by the bay area, though. The room was adequately clean and the bed was very comfortable. The bathroom was very small and the shower had very low water pressure and could use to be updated. Overall, a great place to stay if you are looking for something comfortable, but not extremely fancy. The free breakfast (good) and parking were also some great pluses.

review.title: Great hotel for the money
review.reviewText: Clean, good breakfast, excellent location.

review.title: Holiday 2008
review.reviewText: not enough parking space for guests

review.title: Great place....REALLY close to everything in SF
review.reviewText: Nice place, very clean, staff very friendly and helpful. Close to freeway on & off. Next to airport and close to San Francisco for meetings and/or touristy stuff.

review.title: Best location for SFO
review.reviewText: The hotel is south of SFO airport and directly next to Rent 4 Less car rental (1288 Batshore Hwy, Burlingame, CA). Very easy car return (drop off night before flight) and then suttle connection to SFO. Easiest connection I have ever found for early morning flight plan.
